usecases

Class TradeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • usecases.TradeManager

  • public class TradeManager
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TradeManager(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> listThresholds, java.util.List<entities.Trade> listTrade)
      Creates a TradeManager with editThreshold, cancelledThreshold, openThreshold, weeklyTradeLimit, and borrowDiff based on the tradeManagerList and stores the HashMap of tradeId to Trade from the database.

      • TradeManager

        public TradeManager(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> listThresholds,
                    java.util.List<entities.Trade> listTrade)
        Creates a TradeManager with editThreshold, cancelledThreshold, openThreshold, weeklyTradeLimit, and borrowDiff based on the tradeManagerList and stores the HashMap of tradeId to Trade from the database.
        Parameters:
        listThresholds - List of thresholds from the ThresholdGateway
        listTrade - List of Trade
